author: Special Correspondent
text:
Seeking government’s permission for mercy killing of their mentally deranged daughter, a couple from Kottakulam near Shencottai in the district submitted a petition to Collector M. Karunakaran on Monday.

As the 32-year-old woman is mentally ill since birth, the poor parents took her to several hospitals for treatment, but the treatment could not improve her mental health. When her condition worsened after she suffered from jaw deviation, the couple took her to Tenkasi Government Hospital and then to Tirunelveli Medical College Hospital for treatment.

Referred to Chennai hospital

When the treatment did not yield desirable results, her case was referred to Government Dental Hospital, Chennai, for specialised treatment, but the medical interventions did not provide any significant remedy to the woman, who cannot eat properly as the mouth remains opened.

“We’ve sold whatever we had to meet her medical expenses. As all our efforts went in vain, my wife’s health deteriorated. The small earnings of my two sons from their work as labourers in a saw mill at Shencottai are not sufficient to meet my daughter’s medical expenses and run the family. Hence, the Collector should forward our case to the State government and obtain permission for mercy killing of our daughter as we’ve lost all our hopes,” said the father of the woman after submitting a petition to the Collector.
title: Parents seek permission to end life of mentally ill woman
